The video quality is better than I expected. The problem is, for some reason, the characters' voices aren't audible. But the other 'environment' sounds are fine. Am I doing something wrong here or is there something that I should do to fix this? Please help.

UPDATE:

Just finished downloading. Took a quick look at the video. It's very good. Subs is good. There are 2 subs in the file. Use the english sub and it should be fine. Thanks again condors369 for this great torrent.
Seed it up, I want to give this A/V rate.
Heloc - The audio is encoded in 6 Channels. I presume you are watching on a stereo setup. You need to check your audio config in computer and your media player.
